about.description: The Hong Kong Digital Economy Governance Research Institute Co., Ltd. was founded by scholars and industry experts in the field of digital economy governance, committed to building an inclusive and innovative digital economy governance framework.

coop.desc: The Digital Policy Office coordinates the construction of digital government, with the Hong Kong Monetary Authority's 'Commercial Data Access' and the government's 'Authorized Data Exchange Gate' achieving secure data sharing between government and enterprises
coop.title: Policy Benefits

perf.desc: The Hong Kong government is accelerating the construction of AI supercomputing centers, 5G networks, and cross-border data platforms, providing foundational support for research
perf.title: Infrastructure Support

team.desc: Leveraging 'One Country, Two Systems', bridging mainland policies with international rules, making it a 'test bed' for new governance research
team.title: Institutional Advantages

about.subDesc: We have a team of professionals with deep academic background and industry experience. The Research Institute has established good industrial-academic-research collaboration mechanisms with renowned universities and leading corporate entities.
about.subtitle: Our Advantages
about.title: About the Research Institute

cta.subtitle: Whether you want to optimize existing AI systems or build AI capabilities from scratch, we can provide professional technical support and solutions.

s1.desc: We optimize inference performance for large language models and multimodal large models, helping enterprises achieve maximum benefits under limited computing power conditions.
s1.f1: Participate in global digital governance international standard work
s1.f3: Digital economy governance research report output
s1.title: Global Digital Governance Rules Research and Standard Setting

s2.f1: Government think tank services + digital technology output
s2.f2: Provide policy simulation and deduction platform for digital policy offices
s2.title: Digital Government Governance Support

s3.desc: Provide AI infrastructure construction consulting services for enterprises, including hardware selection, environment setup and optimization solutions.
s3.f1: Build localized AI ethics evaluation system
s3.f2: AI safety and algorithm transparency detection tool development

s4.f1: Cross-border data flow risk assessment tool development

m1.desc: Dr. Liu Chong studied Industrial and Civil Construction at Tongji University in 1984, and subsequently achieved successful industrial practice in real estate construction, agriculture, and technology fields. Liu Chong currently also serves as the President of Tongji University Shenzhen Alumni Association.
m1.name: Dr. LIU

m2.desc: Dr. Ewan YUAN previously worked at internationally renowned cloud computing enterprises and has nearly 20 years of experience in the digital industry. Dr. YUAN currently also serves as a mentor and advisor at the Chinese University of Hong Kong (Shenzhen) and Wuhan University Shenzhen Research Institute.
m2.name: Dr. YUAN

m3.desc: Dr. WANG specializes in digital economy and artificial intelligence fields, with extensive academic and industrial experience, and has authored multiple publications in the AI field.
m3.name: Dr. WANG

team.subtitle: Our team consists of professional talents from top universities and enterprises, with extensive industry experience.
team.title: Core Team

testimonials.subtitle: Hear what our clients say about our services

t1.author: Director Chen
t1.content: The large model optimization solution provided by Qingling Technology has helped us reduce inference costs by 60% while improving system response speed. Their expertise and technical support are impressive.

t2.author: Manager Lin
t2.content: The intelligent customer service agent developed in collaboration with Qingling Technology perfectly aligns with our business needs. The agent's response speed and accuracy far exceeded our expectations, significantly enhancing customer satisfaction.

t3.author: Engineer Zhao
t3.content: The Qingling Technology team provided valuable advice on AI infrastructure setup, helping us avoid many common pitfalls and saving considerable time and costs. Their professional expertise is highly reliable.

testimonials.title: Customer Testimonials
